label.name: This case study is a survey of dairy farmers which...
label.intro:
This case study is a survey of dairy farmers which identifies diversity. The study uses cluster sampling to investigate multiple dairy production systems which exist in a specific location.

This case study is referred to in a number of topics including:

Topic I: Starting a research process

  • Developing research questions and hypotheses


Topic II: Data and variability in a spreadsheet

  • Observing variability


Topic IX: Agroecology and systems thinking

  • Beyond the plot/farm/household
